name: Kara's Darkness Chapter One
description: Kara’s Darkness is a first-person horror-adventure game. With the help of a strange dark figure, a 12 year old girl named Kara must evade her abusive father to escape to Paradise Park, a sanctuary for her and her mother. Explore her world and help Kara confront the darkness inside her!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
